exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R_AbelianGroup N : nat Unable to unify "sum_n ?M2439 ?M2441 = sum_n ?M2440 ?M2441" with "sum_n a N = sum_f_R0 a N".
In environment a : nat -> R N : nat H : forall (a0 b : nat -> ?G) (N0 : nat), (forall n : nat, a0 n = b n) -> sum_n a0 N0 = sum_n b N0 Unable to unify "sum_f_R0 a N" with "sum_n a N".

original: intros a N. apply sum_n_ext. intros n. reflexivity.
